description: This file defines the CartAdapter and CartVH classes which are used to display shopping cart items in a RecyclerView, providing functionalities to add or remove items with UI bindings.

classes.name: CartAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for managing a list of cart items in a RecyclerView, with diffing capabilities.

classes.name: CartVH
classes.description: ViewHolder class binding cart item data to UI components.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a new CartVH instance.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Bind data to the ViewHolder at specified position.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a CartItem object to the UI components in the ViewHolder.
